mapper.insert: insert into basic_appmodule (pkid, name, code, apptype, link, linktarget, smallicon, bigicon, sortnum, status, createtime,usetype) values (#{pkid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{apptype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{link,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{linktarget,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{smallicon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bigicon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sortnum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{usetype,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update basic_appmodule set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, apptype = #{apptype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, link = #{link,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, linktarget = #{linktarget,jdbcType=INTEGER}, smallicon = #{smallicon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bigicon = #{bigicon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sortnum = #{sortnum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, usetype = #{usetype,jdbcType=INTEGER} where pkid = #{pkid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select pkid, name, code, apptype, link, linktarget, smallicon, bigicon, sortnum, status, createtime,usetype from basic_appmodule where pkid = #{pkid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select pkid, name, code, apptype, link, linktarget, smallicon, bigicon, sortnum, status, createtime,usetype from basic_appmodule
select pkid, name, code, apptype, link, linktarget, smallicon, bigicon, sortnum, status, createtime,usetype from basic_appmodule WHERE code=#{0} limit 1
